page.title: 08SANDWICK - MELBOST VILLAGE
page.content: In the village of{Melbost}there are 38 houses and almost every house has a croft.The funny things about Melbost are that the house numbers are all higgledy-piggledy and the other thing that when you come off the main road on your left side it is all Melbost and inbetween the airport gates and no.4A on the right side is Melbost. Apart from that all the houses on the right are Branahuie. Most of the {Aerodrome}is in Melbost, and the Aerodrome belongs to the{Minestery of {Defence.}In Melbost there is a telephone box.
